application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted details relating to the acoustic barrier, persuant to condition 7 of planning permission ref: PP/2013/0997 dated 31.01.2019, are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to demonstrate that a noise barrier along the site boundary with 19-23 St Johns Road would effectively mitigate noise in accordance with the requirements of Appendix 6 of SPG10.
description: Submission of a acoustic fence specification pan pursuant to condition 7 of planning permission ref: PP/2013/0997 dated 31.01.2019 for 'Residential led mixed-use redevelopment of car wash site and adjacent coach and skip storage involving the construction of a part-four and part-six storey building to accommodate 5 x retail shops (A1 Use Class), 1 x flexible retail, restaurant or community centre unit (A1/A3/D1 Use Classes); 45 x residential units (20x 1-bed; 13x 2-bed; and 12x 3-bed); widening of the footway on Western Road; and associated landscaping, amenity space provision, refuse storage and vehicle parking (following demolition of buildings on site)'
